desc: We specialize in custom-built, unique furniture from salvaged trees. Taking you from tree to table - we source and sell live edge wood slabs, burl cookies, and custom wood pieces at various stages of finishing, and provide services to support makers at every stage of woodworking.

layout.text: We spend over 40 hours designing, cutting, planing, shaping, filling, sanding and finishing to build a bespoke dining table.
